A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far one of the greatest in the entire saga.  I didn't know what was going to happen from scene to scene and that is what made it so great!  The only bittersweet part of the whole experience is I'll only get to see it for the first time once.  \n\nI won't go so far as to call it my favorite one (yet)\, but after a couple more viewings I can honestly foresee this becoming my number 1 Star Wars film\, honestly.
